issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
When we package the app and submit to Salesforce it under goes a security audit. They are claiming that we have unsecured information in our cache.db file

Is there a way to manage this file or contents?
fields.summary: Insecure cahce.db file when submitting to Salesforce app exchange

comments.body:
Hi [~peterladis],

Is it possible to give us some more context on this? Perhaps a runnable version of a test case. We can have our engineering team look into that along with how to manage the cache.db file.
